item.title: Facebook script for select all friends
item.description: This code is like to fs.select_all() javascript:elms=document.getElementById(‘friends’).getElementsByTagName(‘li’);for(var fid in elms){if(typeof elms[fid] === ‘object’ && elms[fid].className != “disabled”){fs.click(elms[fid]);}} Only select the new friends whitout invites. Enjoy It!!
